question: She asked for Khula and he said i accept
answer:
QUESTION

after two divorce can third time wife take khulla verbally from her husband over the phone for example wife says to husband i want khulla and i want to return the mehr and "husband say i accept and give you khulla without any mehr returning i forgo the mehr be happy" is khula take place. jazakAllahokhair.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

If the husband says to his wife in response to her request for khula “I accept and give you Khula” then the Khula is valid.                                                                      

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
